name: fingerless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A fingerless glove (= a piece of clothing for the hand and wrist) does not cover the fingers: fingerless gloves It was so cold in my bedroom I did my homework in fingerless gloves. He always wore fingerless leather driving gloves. I am knitting some fingerless mittens.
Creative-Family/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
without any fingers: The statue still had feet and hands, but they were fingerless.
More examplesFewer examplesShe wore black lace fingerless gloves.The man was wearing gloves, but they were fingerless and his fingers were blue.The figures were drawn childishly, with fingerless blobs instead of hands.
